channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Generic Webhook Trigger Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Generic Webhook Trigger Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-25185|2024-08-03T04:36:05.762Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20generic%20webhook%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Generic Webhook Trigger Plugin 1.81 and earlier does not escape the build cause when using the webhook, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.
